channel.title: Java error but i downloaded java!
channel.description:
I think i did something wrong with my computer, but now it wont let me run moparscape! I can run it by clicking on the Jar file, but i cannot use the DOS Batch file button. This isn't really a problem except for i cant run other servers.
Whenever i click on the batch file, i get this message:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file Press any key to continue...
I know yall are going to want to tell me download java and go killmyself. But i've already downloaded Java JDK 6.0 Update 2...so i have no idea what to do!!!

item.title: Java error but i downloaded java!
item.dc:creator: @wcd727 wcd727
item.description:
@wcd727 wrote:

I did that and now its saying “Cannot find the path specified”

Read full topic

item.title: Java error but i downloaded java!
item.dc:creator: @playermanny2 playermanny2
item.description:
@playermanny2 wrote:

right click on compile… and change ur settings to \jdk1.6.0_02 if u have jdk 6u2

item.title: Java error but i downloaded java!
item.dc:creator: @sonjichan sonjichan
item.description:
@sonjichan wrote:

If it’s the batch file then it sounds like it’s a compiler problem. Perhaps maybe update your compiler to work with your newer java if you’ve got an older source.

Read full topic
